languages.text: "Это утверждение ложно. Нашим братством движут предписания священного катехизиса. Личные амбиции иерархов не влияют на чистоту и безупречность их служения... Но перемены действительно страшат их. Им неведомо, как поступить, если Омниссия откроет им новые истины, и оттого они боятся утратить контроль".

traits.locale_text: "Это утверждение ложно. Нашим братством движут предписания священного катехизиса. Инциденты, в ходе которых личные амбиции иерархов влияли на чистоту и безупречность служения Адептус Механикус, единичны и... не являются значимым фактором".

languages.text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."
languages.original_text: "Это утверждение ложно. Нашим братством движут предписания священного катехизиса. Личные амбиции иерархов не влияют на чистоту и безупречность их служения... Но перемены действительно страшат их. Им неведомо, как поступить, если Омниссия откроет им новые истины, и оттого они боятся утратить контроль".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. Our fraternity is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

"This statement is false. Our fraternity is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The incidents where the hierarchs' personal ambitions affected the purity and flawlessness of the Adeptus Mechanicus' servitude are isolated... And cannot be considered a significant factor."

"This statement is false. Our fraternity is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

"This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

"This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Antrieb unserer Gemeinde sind allein die Gebote des heiligen Katechismus. Die persönlichen Ambitionen der Hierarchen wirken sich nicht auf die Reinheit und Integrität ihres Amts aus ... Allerdings fürchten sie den Wandel. Sie wissen nicht, was zu tun ist, sollte der Omnissiah ihnen neue Wahrheiten offenbaren. Daher erfüllt sie der Gedanke, die Kontrolle zu verlieren, mit Furcht."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Antrieb unserer Gemeinde sind allein die Gebote des heiligen Katechismus. Die persönlichen Ambitionen der Hierarchen wirken sich nicht auf die Reinheit und Integrität ihres Amts aus ... Allerdings fürchten sie den Wandel. Sie wissen nicht, was zu tun ist, sollte der Omnissiah ihnen neue Wahrheiten offenbaren. Daher erfüllt sie der Gedanke, die Kontrolle zu verlieren, mit Furcht."

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Notre congrégation suit les préceptes du saint catéchisme. L'ambition personnelle des hiérarques n'affecte ni la pureté ni l'intégrité de leur ministère... Toutefois, il est vrai que le changement les effraie. Ils ignorent ce qu'ils devront faire si l'Omnimessie leur révèle de nouvelles vérités, voilà pourquoi ils sont terrifiés à l'idée de perdre le contrôle. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Notre congrégation suit les préceptes du saint catéchisme. L'ambition personnelle des hiérarques n'affecte ni la pureté ni l'intégrité de leur ministère... Toutefois, il est vrai que le changement les effraie. Ils ignorent ce qu'ils devront faire si l'Omnimessie leur révèle de nouvelles vérités, voilà pourquoi ils sont terrifiés à l'idée de perdre le contrôle. »

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。我们的修会遵循神圣的教义，高阶成员的个人野心并不会影响传教本身的纯洁与完整性……不过，他们确实对变化感到恐惧。当欧姆尼塞亚揭示了新的真理时，他们并不清楚该采取怎样的行动。因此，只要想到可能会失去控制，他们就会恐惧不已。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。我们的修会遵循神圣的教义，高阶成员的个人野心并不会影响传教本身的纯洁与完整性……不过，他们确实对变化感到恐惧。当欧姆尼塞亚揭示了新的真理时，他们并不清楚该采取怎样的行动。因此，只要想到可能会失去控制，他们就会恐惧不已。”

languages.text: 「この主張は間違いである。自分たちの集まりは、神聖な教義の教えに基づいている。ハイエラークの個人的な野心は、その職務の純粋さと誠実さに影響を与えない…しかし、変化は彼らを恐れさせる。万機神が新たな金言を彼らに示した場合、どのような行動をとるべきかを知らないため、支配権を失うと言う考えに恐怖するわけである」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

traits.locale_text: 「この主張は間違いである。自分たちの集まりは、神聖な教義の教えに基づいている。ハイエラークの個人的な野心は、その職務の純粋さと誠実さに影響を与えない…しかし、変化は彼らを恐れさせる。万機神が新たな金言を彼らに示した場合、どのような行動をとるべきかを知らないため、支配権を失うと言う考えに恐怖するわけである」

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es falsa. Nuestra congregación está motivada por los preceptos del catecismo sagrado. Las ambiciones personales de los jerarcas no afectan a la pureza e integridad de su posición... No obstante, el cambio les asusta. No saben qué acción tomar cuando el Omnissiah les revela nuevas verdades, y por eso la idea de perder el control les aterra».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es falsa. Nuestra congregación está motivada por los preceptos del catecismo sagrado. Las ambiciones personales de los jerarcas no afectan a la pureza e integridad de su posición... No obstante, el cambio les asusta. No saben qué acción tomar cuando el Omnissiah les revela nuevas verdades, y por eso la idea de perder el control les aterra».

languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Kurultayımız, kutsal ilmihâlin kaidelerine göre hareket eder. Din adamlarının kişisel arzuları, vazifelerinin saflığını ve erdemliliğini etkilemez. Değişim onları korkutur ama. Hermesih onlara yeni hakikatler sunduğunda nasıl aksiyon alacaklarını bilmezler ve bu yüzden de kontrolü kaybetme düşüncesi içlerini dehşetle doldurur."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. Our congregation is motivated by the precepts of the sacred catechism. The hierarchs' personal ambitions do not affect the purity and integrity of their ministry... However, change does frighten them. They do not know what action is to be taken should the Omnissiah reveal new truths to them, and that is why the thought of losing control fills them with dread."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Kurultayımız, kutsal ilmihâlin kaidelerine göre hareket eder. Din adamlarının kişisel arzuları, vazifelerinin saflığını ve erdemliliğini etkilemez. Değişim onları korkutur ama. Hermesih onlara yeni hakikatler sunduğunda nasıl aksiyon alacaklarını bilmezler ve bu yüzden de kontrolü kaybetme düşüncesi içlerini dehşetle doldurur."
